# INUIHostedViewContext.siriSnippet

**Case**

A Siri result snippet. This value indicates that your content is being displayed from the Siri interaction interface.

## Declaration

```swift
case siriSnippet
```

## Constants

- **INUIHostedViewContext.mapsCard**: A place card in Maps. This value indicates that your content is being displayed from Maps.

items.description: A place card in Maps. This value indicates that your content is being displayed from Maps.
items.name: INUIHostedViewContext.mapsCard

title: INUIHostedViewContext.siriSnippet
